arts.ttl: I found Marcelo Bielsa very difficult to work with at Leeds United
arts.sum: In quotes reported by Turkish publication Sporx, Saiz said: “ Bielsa is crazy about football. “In the past, football was played where the number tens had more impact on the game,” Saiz said.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke reveals Leeds United referee apology and shares injury update in Millwall verdict
arts.sum: " We got an [apology] call saying we should have got a goal vs Coventry [when Gnonto scored] And today, the same assistant gives the same offside decision. On Piroe's disallowed goal, Farke said: " I could be relaxed today because it didn't influence the result.

arts.ttl: Alex Neil felt his Millwall side were competitive for ‘large parts’ of 2-0 loss to Championship leaders Leeds United
arts.sum: Manor Solomon’s third-minute cross took a deflection off Jake Cooper with Lions goalkeeper Lukas Jensen only able to push the ball across his goal-line. That’s highly unfortunate and it makes it difficult because although we want to stay in the game it means at some point we have to be more aggressive and try to score a goal

arts.ttl: Leeds United have the last laugh against Millwall after social media jibe
arts.sum: Leeds United's social media team rubbed salt in the wounds of Millwall after their 2-0 win over the Lions at Elland Road. Burnley remain the last team to win at Elland Road in the Championship this season, with the Whites now top of the table, they were quick to remind tonight's visitors.

arts.ttl: 'Frustrated' Millwall boss Alex Neil pays Leeds United big compliment after Elland Road loss
arts.sum: Millwall boss Alex Neil was unhappy with the manner of the first goal his side conceded in their defeat at Leeds United. But a 15th home win of the season saw United move two points clear of the Blades and four above third-placed Burnley.

arts.ttl: Ao Tanaka’s thumping finish sends Leeds back top of the Championship
arts.sum: Millwall skipper Jake Cooper’s own goal gave Leeds an early lead.

arts.ttl: Leeds reach verbal agreement to sign PL winner for next season
arts.sum: Leeds United are reportedly looking to bring back former midfielder Kalvin Phillips, who is now edging closer to a sensational return to Elland Road. Despite a recent dip in form that has put their automatic promotion hopes in jeopardy, Leeds have been making moves behind the scenes to bring Phillips back home. The club has […] The post Leeds reach verbal agreement to sign PL winner for next season appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Leeds United team news vs Millwall as Daniel Farke makes one change
arts.sum: Joe Rothwell starts for Leeds United in tonight's game against Millwall with Daniel Farke placing Ilia Gruev on the bench. Rothwell was benched for the defeat to Portsmouth on Sunday in place of Gruev, but Farke goes with the same line up that drew against West Brom 11 days ago.

arts.ttl: 49ers sent clear Leeds United transfer demand before summer plan is unveiled amid title aims
arts.sum: Over 1,600 people took part in the survey, with 83 per cent calling on United to permanently sign Rothwell . Rothwell and Solomon are due to return to their parent clubs Bournemouth and Tottenham Hotspur respectively following the climax of the 2024/25 season.

arts.ttl: Aaronson out of USMNT squad, Poch explains snub
arts.sum: However, there won’t be any international duty for Brenden Aaronson, left out of Mauricio Pochettino’s USMNT squad: Leeds United are looking to go into the upcoming international break top of the league with a decent cushion, starting tonight against Millwall.
